name: Возвращение в замок злого колдуна
description:
"Возвращение в замок злого колдуна" is a fan game based on a reader proposal published in issue 21 of "Великий Дракон" (Great Dragon) magazine. You can find the original proposal here: http://www.greatdragon.ru/online/21/888-214445-dva-brata-2-igrayte-i-umneyte.htm...

Our heroine searches for her lover in the old castle where the evil warlock was said to once reside. The castle still has some old magic left, and all she has to defend herself is a cassette with her aerobics routine. The record is about 7 minutes long, but even this time can be cut short. If she wouldn't manage to save her guy until the music ends, she is doomed!

The controls are
left and right arrows to walk
space to jump
down arrow to sit/lie down (can be used for gap traversal)
space/down arrow to jump off the skull lift (hold left/right arrow to jump to the side)
another crucial key which you have to guess when the time comes
